snippet.title: Version 1.6 Teaser - "Among the Forgotten Ruins" | Zenless Zone Zero
snippet.description:
Write a poem with your bones, and bury your tears with the past.
The past will eventually be forgotten, and the future marches toward destruction.
Above the decaying ruins, some seek redemption, some stand guard, some pursue, and some resist.

—Welcome to New Eridu!—
PS5™/iOS/Android/PC | Version 1.5 "Astra-nomical Moment" of Zenless Zone Zero, HoYoverse's urban fantasy ARPG, is out now: https://hoyo.link/6SOkFDAL

▼ Official Community ▼
